requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 98, 2000, ME, XP, Vista, 7, 8 (Windows 95 and NT not supported)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 5 series or above, ATI Radeon 9 series or above, with at least 256MB video memory
  • Hard Drive: 2 GB of free space
  • Sound: DirectX 9 compatible sound card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 98, 2000, ME, XP or Vista, 7, 8 (Windows 95 and NT not supported)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 768 MB RAM or more
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 5 series or above, ATI Radeon 9 series or above, with at least 256MB video memory
  • Hard Drive: 2 GB of free space
  • Sound: DirectX 9 compatible sound card
